class pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_biomarkers.biomarkers_extract_PPG(data, peak_value, peak_time, next_peak_value, next_peak_time, onsets_values, onsets_times, sample_rate, list_biomarkers, fiducials)[source]

The function calculates the Augmentation Index, (PPG(Tp2) − PPG(Tp1))/Asp.

Returns:

AI feature

getAUCdia()[source]

The function calculates Area Under Diastolic Curve, the area under the pulse wave between the dicrotic notch and pulse offset.

Returns:

AUCdia feature

getAUCpi()[source]

The function the Area Under Pulse Interval Curve, the area under the pulse wave between pulse onset and pulse offset.

Returns:

AUCpi feature

getAUCsys()[source]

The function calculates the Area Under Systolic Curve, the area under the pulse wave between the pulse onset and dicrotic notch.

Returns:

AUCsys feature

getDiastolicPeak()[source]

The function calculates the Diastolic Peak Amplitude, the difference in amplitude between the pulse onset and the diastolic peak.

Returns:

Diastolic Peak Amplitude feature

getDiastolicWidth_d_percent(d)[source]

The function calculates the Diastolic Width, the width at x% of the Systolic Peak Amplitude between the systolic peak and pulse offset.

Parameters:

d – the percentage chosen to calculate the width

Returns:

Tdwx feature

getDicroticNotchAmplitude()[source]

The function calculates the Dicrotic Notch Amplitude, the difference in amplitude between the pulse onset and the dicrotic notch.

Returns:

Dicrotic Notch Amplitude feature

getIPA()[source]

The function calculates the Inflection Point Area, the ratio of the Area Under Diastolic Curve to the Area Under Systolic Curve.

Returns:

IPA feature

getIPAD()[source]

The function calculates the Inflection point area plus normalised d-point amplitude, AUCdia/AUCsys+Ad/Aa.

Returns:

IPAD feature

getIPR()[source]

The function calculates the Instantaneous Pulse Rate, 60/CP.

Returns:

IPR feature

getMS()[source]

The function calculates Maximum slope, PPG’(u)/(PPG(systolic peak) − PPG(systolic onset))

Returns:

MS feature

getPIR()[source]

The function calculates the ratio between the peak value and the right onset value

Returns:

pir feature

getPulseOffsetAmplitude()[source]

The function calculates the Pulse Offset Amplitude, the difference in amplitude between the pulse onset and pulse offset.

Returns:

Pulse Offset Amplitude feature

getRIp1()[source]

The function calculates the Reflection Index of p1, Adp/(PPG(Tp1) − PPG(Tpi(0))).

Returns:

RIp1 feature

getRIp2()[source]

The function calculates the Reflection Index of p2, Adp/(PPG(Tp2) − PPG(Tpi(0))).

Returns:

RIp2 feature

getRatioSW_DW(d)[source]

The function calculates the ratio of systolic and diastolic width at d percent of the pulse height

Parameters:

d – the percentage chosen to calculate the width

Returns:

ratio feature

getSC()[source]

The function calculates the Spring Constant, PPG”(Tsp)/((Asp-Au)/Asp).

Returns:

SC feature

getSTT()[source]

STT means slope transit time, which based on geometrical considerations of the PPG pulse wave to account for simultaneous.

Returns:

STT feature

Tpwx feature

get_feature_extract_func()[source]

This function go through the list of biomarkers and call the function that is relevant to calculate it each feature takes two spots in the feature vector: one for the average value and one for its standard deviation.

Returns biomarkers_vec:

a vector of each feature avg value and std of the patient

map_func()[source]

This function assign for each name of biomarkers a function that calculates it

Returns my_funcs:

a dictionary where the key is the name of the feature and the value is the function to call

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_biomarkers.get_biomarkers(s, fiducials, biomarkers_lst)[source]

The function calculates the biomedical biomarkers of PPG signal.

Parameters:

  • s – a struct of PPG signal: - s.v: a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.name: name of the record - s.v: 1-d array, a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.filt_sig: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG values - s.filt_d1: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’ values - s.filt_d2: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG” values - s.filt_d3: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’” values

  • fiducials – M-d Dateframe, where M is the number of fiducial points

  • biomarkers_lst – list of biomarkers

Returns:

  • df: data frame with onsets, offset and peaks

  • df_biomarkers: data frame with PPG signal biomarkers

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_derivs_ratios module

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_derivs_ratios.get_bm_derivs_ratios(s, fiducials)[source]

This function returns the biomarkers of Derivatives ratios.

Parameters:

  • s – a struct of PPG signal: - s.v: a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.name: name of the record - s.v: 1-d array, a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.filt_sig: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG values - s.filt_d1: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’ values - s.filt_d2: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG” values - s.filt_d3: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’” values

  • fiducials – a dictionary where the key is the name of the fiducial pints and the value is the list of fiducial points PPG Fiducials Points. - PPG signal: List of pulse onset, systolic peak, dicrotic notch, diastolic peak - 1st derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 1st derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (u,v) - 2nd derivative: List of maximum and minimum points in 2nd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (a, b, c, d, e) - 3rd derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 3rd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (p1, p2)

Return biomarkers:

dictionary of biomarkers of Derivatives ratios

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_ppg_derivs module

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_ppg_derivs.get_bm_ppg_derivs(s, fiducials)[source]

This function returns the biomarkers of PPG derivatives.

Parameters:

  • s – a struct of PPG signal: - s.v: a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.name: name of the record - s.v: 1-d array, a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.filt_sig: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG values - s.filt_d1: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’ values - s.filt_d2: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG” values - s.filt_d3: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’” values

  • fiducials – a dictionary where the key is the name of the fiducial pints and the value is the list of fiducial points PPG Fiducials Points. - PPG signal: List of pulse onset, systolic peak, dicrotic notch, diastolic peak - 1st derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 1st derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (u,v) - 2nd derivative: List of maximum and minimum points in 2nd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (a, b, c, d, e) - 3rd derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 3rd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (p1, p2)

Return biomarkers:

dictionary of biomarkers of PPG derivatives

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_ppg_sig module

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_ppg_sig.get_bm_ppg_sig(s, fiducials)[source]

This function returns the biomarkers of PPG signal.

Parameters:

  • s – a struct of PPG signal: - s.v: a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.name: name of the record - s.v: 1-d array, a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.filt_sig: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG values - s.filt_d1: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’ values - s.filt_d2: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG” values - s.filt_d3: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’” values

  • fiducials – a dictionary where the key is the name of the fiducial pints and the value is the list of fiducial points PPG Fiducials Points. - PPG signal: List of pulse onset, systolic peak, dicrotic notch, diastolic peak - 1st derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 1st derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (u,v) - 2nd derivative: List of maximum and minimum points in 2nd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (a, b, c, d, e) - 3rd derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 3rd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (p1, p2)

Return biomarkers:

dictionary of biomarkers of PPG signal

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_sig_ratios module

pyPPG.ppg_bm.get_bm_sig_ratios.get_bm_sig_ratios(s, fiducials)[source]

This function returns the biomarkers of Signal ratios.

Parameters:

  • s – a struct of PPG signal: - s.v: a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.name: name of the record - s.v: 1-d array, a vector of PPG values - s.fs: the sampling frequency of the PPG in Hz - s.filt_sig: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG values - s.filt_d1: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’ values - s.filt_d2: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG” values - s.filt_d3: 1-d array, a vector of the filtered PPG’” values

  • fiducials – a dictionary where the key is the name of the fiducial pints and the value is the list of fiducial points PPG Fiducials Points. - PPG signal: List of pulse onset, systolic peak, dicrotic notch, diastolic peak - 1st derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 1st derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (u,v) - 2nd derivative: List of maximum and minimum points in 2nd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (a, b, c, d, e) - 3rd derivative: List of points of 1st maximum and minimum in 3rd derivitive between the onset to onset intervals (p1, p2)

Return biomarkers:

dictionary of biomarkers of Signal ratios
